10. In case of proxy voting, please identify:

Name of the proxy holder

The date until which the voting rights will be held

11. Additional information xvi

In reference to Section 9, the shares detailed are managed by the named discretionary investment management entity within multiple portfolios on behalf of underlying clients, based on investment management agreements where-by the client has delegated the exercise of the voting power to the referenced investment manager.

This disclosure also reflects the fact that the voting rights effectively held indirectly by the underlying intermediate holding company Standard Life Investments (Holdings) Limited ("SLIHL") increased above the 12% notifiable threshold due to trading on 28 September 2021. SLIHL now effectively holds 12.623764% of the delegated voting rights of the shares in The Go-Ahead Group plc. Prior to this crossing SLIHL effectively held 11.840581% of the delegated voting rights.

Place of completion

Aberdeen, United Kingdom

Date of completion

29 September 2021

For further information, please contact:

Carolyn Ferguson, Group Company Secretary - 0191 232 3123
